name: Arcangel: The Legacy of Peace
storyline:
"In my dreams I see, a sea of pain. A torrent of war, fear the strange." - CYRUS I, the first conscious computer prior to deactivation at UMIST, 2014.

The year is 3028. The Earth forms the centre of a vast interplanetary co-operative known as the Sphere. Ruled by Archetype and Progenitor, Titans, immortal twin beings of immense mental power. Genetic super beings engineered over a century ago by Dr Tobias Xenos, the Titans control the Sphere by leading an inherited government of human and alien leaders called the Hyperion Sect. Formed in 2048 as a united religious council after first contact with alien races, the Sect administrate the Sphere. Worship of the Titans is compulsory. The Sphere is defended by the Angels, an advanced force of human and alien soldiers. The elite of these form Archetypes personal guard Archetypes-Angels, shortened to Arcangels. The Sphere is now at peace. The last war in the Sphere was over 30 years ago.

Progenitor brings peace.
Archetype brings understanding.
summary: Control an elite force of soldiers from any of eight different sides. Fight on over 40 maps with more than 100 weapons and pieces of equipment. When you've had enough of the advanced computer intelligence, beat your friends in an up to eight player hot-seat multi-player mode! Use the most advanced turn based system on Earth: Run, walk, duck, heal, conceal and rest your troops. Listen for the enemy and guard along the line of sight. Light the surrounding terrain or hunt in darkness.
